entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
